dotplot.errors

dotplot.errors.Rd

build a vertical dotplot with error bars

Usage

# S3 method for class 'errors'
dotplot(
  x,
  myTheme = simpleTheme(pch = 19, col = 1),
  qlabel = "Estimated rate",
  add.text.to.qlabel = "",
  type.bar = "CI",
  conf.level = 0.95,
  end.length = 0.05,
  reorder.groups = TRUE,
  reordering = "decreasing",
  label.define = list(),
  reference.line = NULL,
  bar.color = 1,
  horizontal = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

x

dataframe

myTheme

default values for pch and col (todo)

qlabel

text for axis label

add.text.to.qlabel

additional text for axis label

type.bar

default is "CI"

conf.level

default is .95

end.length

default is .05

reorder.groups

default is TRUE

reordering

order of sorting when reorder.groups is TRUE

label.define

(todo)

reference.line

value for the reference line. default is null

bar.color

default is 1

horizontal

layout of the dotplot. default is TRUE

...

further arguments passed to or from other methods.

Author

Rollie Parrish
